JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Elisabeth Steiner;Julia Laffranque;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE , GPE . He is a military serviceman .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) , sitting in GPE , in the final instance dismissed the applicant 's claims against his commanding officers .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in the final instance allowed the applicant 's other claim . It made the following order :

“ The commanding officer of military unit no . DATE shall provide [ the applicant ] with data about the constitutive elements of his monetary allowance paid to him from DATE until DATE , as well as about reasons and grounds for him being deprived of bonus in DATE ” .
CARDINAL . ORG judgment of DATE was final and immediately enforceable .

CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiffs of ORG of ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) commenced the enforcement proceedings . They requested the commanding officer to enforce the judgment of DATE in the applicant 's favour voluntarily within DATE .

CARDINAL . Meanwhile , on DATE the CARDINALth ORG ( “ the Garrison Court ” ) , sitting in LOC , allowed another claim lodged by the applicant . It ordered the commanding officer of the military unit no . DATE to provide the applicant with an DATE leave starting from DATE . The judgment of DATE was not appealed against and became final and enforceable on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiffs of ORG commenced the enforcement proceedings . They requested the commanding officer to enforce the judgment of DATE in the applicant 's favour voluntarily within a DATE period . The judgment was enforced before DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the commanding officer of the military unit no . DATE wrote to the applicant providing him with the relevant information , as he had been ordered to do by ORG judgment of DATE . The letter of CARDINAL DATE indicated that it was sent in compliance with the judgment of DATE . It was received by the applicant on DATE .

CARDINAL . Domestic law and practice on execution of the judgments delivered against the ORG and its entities are summarised in PERSON ( no . CARDINAL ) v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , ORG CARDINAL- ... ) .

CARDINAL . The DATE legislation introducing a new domestic remedy in respect of an alleged violation of one 's right to enforcement of a judgment within reasonable time is summarised in GPE and PERSON v. GPE ( dec . ) , nos . CARDINAL and CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE , and GPE v. GPE ( dec . ) , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Joint Plenary of ORG of GPE and ORG of GPE adopted a resolution interpreting the above - mentioned legislative provisions . It is reiterated in the resolution that the legislation in question is applicable only in respect of the monetary awards payable from the public funds pursuant to a contractual or legal provision ( paragraph CARDINAL ) .
